variables.label: ThingsBoard Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags hhttps://hub.docker.com/r/thingsboard/tb-postgres/tags

variables.label: MQTT device API port
variables.description: Choose what port to expose the MQTT device API on.

variables.label: COAP device API port
variables.description: Choose what port to expose the COAP device API on.

instructions.start:
ThingsBoard is an open-source IoT platform for data collection, processing, visualization, and device management.

More details: https://thingsboard.io/
instructions.end: ThingsBoard has been successfully deployed! Make sure to port forward $$mqtt_port and $$coap_port.

description: ThingsBoard is an open-source IoT platform for data collection, processing, visualization, device management, with an integrated Postgres database.
